text: [Music]
we are a computational biology company
that means we make software for the life
science industry so we help them on
their digital transformation journey you
know when you deal with biological data
you know this is often very confidential
very proprietary data and you deal with
a lot of data and you have to have large
compute resources at your fingertips and
all these points are very well addressed
within the iws environment if we deploy
one of our solutions to our customers it
typically takes months to set up the ict
infrastructure with aws it's just a
matter of minutes we choose aws because
it has a broad market penetration so
many of our customers already use aws
and we're confronted with the challenge
that we have to meet security standards
that are local so like saktu in the
united states and other you know
certifications that are required for the
ict infrastructure and as a small
organization
we cannot serve that up on a global
scale we can deliver our software but we
have to meet these ict requirements and
aws is helping us on that and aws helps
us to actually focus on our core
competencies and takes off the burden of
dealing with all the technical details
which we're very well aware of which we
control but which we don't want to
necessarily have to deal on a day-to-day
basis for us it's critical that we can
focus on our core competencies
being you know a key provider to
decipher you know how living system
function and work
and that's something that will be
important for the next decade and and
and beyond
